programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E03, When a church deacon is found shot to death it looks like police may have stumbled upon a multi-party murder plot. And, a wife remains a key suspect in her husband's murder case for six years, until she attempts to prove her own innocence.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E10, In 1984, a 15-year-old girl is found murdered in her grandparents' home. For decades, a stalled investigation only fuels the town rumor mill, pointing an accusing finger at her 13-year-old sister.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E18, New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E10, Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E14, A serial rapist seals his own fate when he sends a taunting letter to police. And when a man is found dead in South Dakota, his head bashed in by a 50-pound rock, investigators go on a 20-year search for the killers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Attack of the Giant Leeches
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Attack of the Giant Leeches, S04E06, Hillbillies, holo-clowns, and a giant leech named Patches abound when Joel and the Bots take on this bloodsucking tale from acclaimed producer/director Roger Corman.

programme.title: The Rebel Set
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Rebel Set, S04E19, Three coffee shop customers help an owner rob an armored car.

programme.title: Danger Death Ray
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Danger Death Ray, S06E20, A slick secret agent investigating an evil organization that stole a top secret death ray.
MST3K: Doctor Mordrid, 20220610000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch as the magical DOCTOR MORDRID (1992) defends Earth from the forces of evil, and Dr. Kabahl schemes to increase viewership.

programme.title: Girl in Gold Boots
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E02, A girl from rural California goes to Los Angeles to work as a go-go dancer, but soon gets involved with drug dealers.

programme.title: Are You Ready for Marriage?
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E02, A high school senior named Sue and her boyfriend want to get married right after Sue graduates. A marriage counselor discourages the young couple from entering into a hasty marriage.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E06, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

programme.title: Rocket Attack U.S.A.
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Rocket Attack U.S.A., S02E05, The crew watches the second chapter of The Phantom Creeps and a film about an American spy sent to the Soviet Union to investigate a missile attack. Joel hosts a quiz show with the Bots.

MST3K: Bloodlust, 19940903000000 +0000, Mike and the Bots watch a cheap ripoff of The Most Dangerous Game, where a rich game hunter tricks a group of stranded college kids into becoming prey for his latest blood sport.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Keeping Clean And Neat
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E21, Don't leave the house before watching this indispensable guide to hygiene.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 1: The Menacing Power
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E10, The first installment of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.

MST3K: Fugitive Alien, 19910817000000 +0000, Movie constructed from two episodes of a Japanese television show. An alien marauder becomes a fugitive from his planet Valnar's Star, then joins the Earth spaceship Bacchus 3 to fight against his former masters.

The Courageous Heart of Irena Sendler, 20090419000000 +0000, The story of Irena Sendler, a social worker who was part of the Polish underground during World War II and was arrested by the Nazi's for saving the lives of nearly 2,500 Jewish children by smuggling them out of the Warsaw ghetto.

When Love Is Not Enough: The Lois Wilson Story, 20100425000000 +0000, Based on the true story of the enduring but troubled love between Lois Wilson, co-founder of Al-Anon, and her alcoholic husband Bill Wilson, co-founder of Alcoholics Anonymous. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

A Season for Miracles, 19981231000000 +0000, With a little help from an angel, Christmas miracles happen for a homeless family. Stars Patty Duke, Laura Dern, Carla Gugino, Lynn Redgrave, and Kathy Baker. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Secrets, Lies and School Supplies
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Trace and the O'Briens attempt to put their own challenges aside.

programme.title: Pasts and Presents
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. Jess turns to her mother for help planning her cousins wedding.

programme.title: Photographs and Memories
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Abby sends her girls off to their first day at a new school.

programme.title: It's Always Nashville
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Trace hits the road to record an album with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Buried Treasures
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E05, Hallmark Original Series. Nell discovers a treasure map that Bree made as a teen.

programme.title: Grand Openings
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E06, Hallmark Original Series. As the nightclub opening nears, Trace spends late nights practicing.

programme.title: All Our Yesterdays
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E07, Hallmark Original Series. Mick receives damaging information about Thomas.

programme.title: Forest Through the Trees
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Abby and Trace talk about their past and the future during a camping getaway.

programme.title: The Royal Court
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. After his band's video goes viral, Trace receives offers.

When Sparks Fly, 20140628000000 +0000, Fireworks go off when Amy Peterson comes home to help save her family's annual 4th of July celebration and discovers she loves the man she left behind years ago to pursue her dreams of becoming a journalist. Stars Meghan Markle.

Once Upon a Winter's Date, 20210214000000 +0000, Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: Air (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E02, After secretly contacting Homeworld Command, Dr. Rush (Robert Carlyle) claims that he has been placed in charge by Gen. O’Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and that there is no hope of returning to Earth. But his assertions are soon questioned.

programme.title: The Torment Of Tantalus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E11, Dr. Daniel Jackson discovers that in 1945, a young professor slipped through the Stargate, never to return. Together with his still living fiancée, the SG-1 team discovers the now aged professor trapped in a decaying fortress.

programme.title: Bloodlines
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E12, With the proviso that he bring back a Goa'uld larva for study, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) returns to Chulak to stop the Goa'uld from enslaving his son Rya'c. Trouble is, Rya'c needs a larva to survive - and the only one available is Teal'c's.

programme.title: Fire And Water
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E13, The SG-1 team returns from the planet Oannes in a panic and minus Daniel Jackson, who was last seen being consumed by a column of flames. But as his comrades mourn him on Earth, Daniel is the captive of an amphibious humanoid creature known as Nem.

programme.title: Hathor
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E14, The evil Goa'uld Hathor (Suanne Braun) escapes from a Mayan pyramid in Mexico. At the Stargate facility, she uses her charms to seduce the men into helping her take over the world. Can Samantha Carter and her female colleagues defeat her?

programme.title: Singularity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E15, Capt. Carter returns with the sole survivor of a planetary plague - a little girl, Cassandra. As they become attached, Carter discovers the girl's terrible secret - a time bomb implanted by the Goa'uld. Can she save the girl - and the world?

programme.title: Cor-Ai
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E16, Colonel Jack O'Neill and the team travel to Chartago, where Teal'c is recognized as once having been head Jaffa to the sinister Goa'uld Apothis. He's arrested for murder and put on trial for his life. Can his comrades save him?

programme.title: Enigma
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E17, The SG-1 team rescues a group of highly developed survivors from the cataclysmic planet of Tollan. To stop the legendary knowledge of the Tollan people from falling into the wrong hands, O'Neill and his team stake all on the cross-universal rescue.

programme.title: Solitudes
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E18, Following a Stargate technical defect, O'Neill and Carter find themselves stranded on an icy wasteland. O'Neill is severely wounded, both are freezing to death, and nobody can find the section of the universe in which they are stranded!

programme.title: Tin Man
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E19, Upon landing on Planet PX3 989, the mysterious alien Harlan renders the SG-1 team unconscious. After waking and returning to Earth, they find that their spirits and minds have been transferred to androids. Can the team regain their bodies and souls?

programme.title: There But For The Grace Of God
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E20, A mysterious mirror transports Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) to another dimension. Suddenly he finds himself on an alternate Earth that is under attack from the Goa'uld. Can he return to his dimension and save the world?

programme.title: Politics
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E21, Only Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) knows of the Goa'uld plans to invade Earth. But no one takes his warnings seriously - in fact, this time the authorities have chosen to terminate the costly Stargate program and close the gate forever.

programme.title: Within The Serpent's Grasp
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E22, To stop the Goa'uld invasion, the SG-1 team disobeys orders and transports itself to the Goa'uld attack headquarters. Landing amidst preparations for an all-out strike on Earth, the way home is blocked. Can the team avert disaster and save humanity?

programme.title: Michael
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E18, Lt. Kenmore wakes up in the infirmary without his memory. He begins to think there is something wrong when his nightmares about being a Wraith seem to be more than real. His fears would be unfounded if not for the serum that turns Wraiths humans.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E19, Sheppard and the team visits the planet Taranis at the invitation of two leading citizens, Dr. Norina Pero and Chancellor Lycus, who want McKay to repair a failing shield generator at an Ancient base, and Ancient warship, they've discovered.

programme.title: Allies
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E20, Kenmore arrives back in Atlantis with a group of Wraith, in the midst of a civil war. Kenmore, hoping to leverage his knowledge of Atlantis against Sheppard and the team, suggests a trade; Beckett's serum, in exchange for keeping Atlantis hidden.

programme.title: No Man's Land
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E01, After their alliance with the Wraith backfires, the team must find a way to stop two Hive ships that are headed for Earth. Weir orders to attack and Sheppard is forced to rely on Michael to help him save McKay and Ronon, who are being held prisoners.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E279, An elderly woman is overcome by gas fumes inside her home. Two men exploring a cave are swept away by floodwaters.

programme.title: Crash, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E02, Mitch struggles with Neely's lies and the truth about their shipboard wedding. Cody and April race to save survivors of their plane crash. A tragic turn of events puts April in mortal danger when half the plane's fuselage sinks beneath the Pacific.

programme.title: Sharks, Lies and Videotape
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E03, Captain Alexis "Alex" Ryker, the conniving CEO of a private lifeguard company, wants to take over Baywatch to expand her private lifeguarding empire. Mitch suspects Alex of setting up fake rescues and recruits Cody to spy on the BayGuard team.

programme.title: Dolphin Quest
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E04, Cody accompanies Alex on a vacation to Hawaii where she wants to take her autistic 10-year-old nephew, Timmy, to swim with a dolphin in the local lagoon. Cody spends quality time with Lani's sister, Callie, a local Hawaiian lifeguard.

programme.title: The Natural
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E05, A mysterious lifeguard makes rescues around Baywatch, then vanishes. After going over Mitch's head one too many times, Alex gets an annoying new partner.

programme.title: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E06, April suffers PTSD after losing a rescue victim. Mitch and the victim's widow refused to give up searching for his body. Jessie runs into an old beau who could undermine her future at Baywatch.

programme.title: Hot Summer Night
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E07, Hobie struggles with his irresponsible actions leading to a boating accident that leaves a girl in a coma. Jessie is gripped with fear after April tells her of a recent, job-related tragedy.

programme.title: Swept Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E08, Mitch befriends a boy who joins junior lifeguards in hopes of escaping a brutal home life. Jessie makes a passionate play for JD. Alex auditions for “Jeopardy!”

programme.title: The Swimmer
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E09, Upset about his failed marriage to Neely, Mitch goes for a day-long tower swim along the beach and encounters problems that distract from his own, including April and Craig's May/December romance, and reluctant heroes Cody and JD.

programme.title: Friends Forever
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E10, A young, hearing-impaired girl learns a lesson in friendship when she, Mitch and Alex protect an orangutan, while Cody and Jessie deal with its abusive owner.

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E11, Cody puts his career, and his life, on the line when he uses a performance-enhancing supplement in hopes of making the Olympic swim team. Alex becomes the object of Mitch's rejection, and Newmie's affection.

programme.title: The Big Blue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E12, Mitch tries to reunite an Army parachutist with her estranged Naval-officer father, while Cody helps a beautiful woman try to reach record-setting depths at a national free-diving competition.

programme.title: Come Fly with Me
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E13, After he tries to save Tanner from his abusive father, Mitch ends up on the wrong side of the law. Meanwhile, Jessie's irresistible charm makes a stunt pilot's heart take flight.

programme.title: Boys will be Boys
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E14, When caught up in a high-risk adventure at sea, Craig tells Mitch a shocking secret. Meanwhile, Jessie works to creatively end JD and Cody's rivalry during a beachside triathlon, and April comes clean with Manny.

programme.title: Baywatch Grand Prix
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E15, Mitch feels the need for speed when Tanner's cousin, Damon Lusk, a race car driver in town for a major competition, visits Baywatch. Meanwhile, Newmie and the gang develop a TV show about lifeguards that they try to sell it into syndication.

programme.title: Baywatch Down Under, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E16, After Mitch's lifeguard buddy's ex-wife dies in Australia, Mitch and the team accompany him on a trip down under to meet the son he's never known.

programme.title: Baywatch Down Under, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E17, While team Baywatch prepares to compete against the Australian guards, Jake must choose between staying down under with his son or returning home. The competing lifeguards must put their intense rivalry aside to save a life.

programme.title: Water Dance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E18, Cody learns a lesson in love when he and Mitch help a troubled violinist escape her dangerously overbearing mentor with a secret agenda. Meanwhile, Alex sets out to prove her worth at Baywatch by retaking the grueling rookie test with Jessie.
